createGroup.dialogDescription: Create a group and invite your friends to join
createGroup.title: Group title
createGroup.groupCodeDescription: The group code is a unique 6-character string that is automatically generated for your group. This code will be used to invite others to join your group.

tooltipContent.public: A public group is open to everyone. Anyone can view, join, and participate in discussions and activities within the group. This setting is ideal for community-oriented groups where information is shared openly and collaboration is encouraged. Members can freely invite others to join, and all group content is visible to the public.
tooltipContent.private: A private group restricts access to invited members only. Only those who have been explicitly invited can view the group, its members, and its content. This setting is suitable for discussions or activities that require confidentiality or a limited audience. Members can manage invitations and control who can join, ensuring that sensitive information remains within the group.
tooltipContent.hidden: A hidden group is not visible to the public and does not appear in search results. Only invited members can access the group, and they cannot see any information about the group unless they are part of it. This setting is ideal for discussions that require maximum confidentiality and discretion. Even the existence of the group remains unknown to non-members, making it suitable for sensitive topics or private collaborations.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.

fullName.label: Full name
fullName.description: This name will be displayed publicly.

username.label: Username
username.description: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym.

email.label: Email
email.description: This email will be used for login and notifications. You can't change it.

phoneNumber.label: Phone number
phoneNumber.description: This is optional and will not be displayed publicly. It will be used for account recovery. (Maybe)

bio.label: Bio
bio.description: You can write a little bit about yourself here. This will be shown on your profile page.
